remarks: Condition for the support of a function operation to be a subset of the support of the left function term.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2019.)
statement:
suppofssd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
suppofssd.2 $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
suppofssd.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
suppofssd.4 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> B ) $.
suppofss1d.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( Z X x ) = Z ) $.
suppofss1d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F oF X G ) supp Z ) C_ ( F supp Z ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d X x $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph x $.
